title: Crafting
content:
These require players to interact with specific NPCs, obtain Ingredients or arrive at specific destinations in order to craft certain items as part of the quest. Below are some of the crafting abilities and their related quests.

Get help from Healer Nettie: Potion Elixir of Silvanus The Adamantine Forge: Adamantine Weapon and Armor Forging Finish the Masterwork Weapon: Sussur Weapons
